title: One Iniquity Upon the Other Piled Up in This Way (Delict türmte jedoch ...) from Potsdamer Platz oder Die Nächte des neuen Messias. Ekstatische Visionen (Potsdamer Platz or The Nights of the New Messiah. Ecstatic Visions)
medium: Photolithographic reproduction from an illustrated book with 10 photolithographic reproductions after pen and ink drawings (including title page, end papers, and colophon)
